flavor_text_entries.black:
This ominous Pokémon is feared.
Through cities it wanders, searching
for the spirits of the fallen.
flavor_text_entries.white:
It arrives near the moment of death
and steals spirit from the body.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful
fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting
for people to pass on.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful
fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting
for people to pass on.
flavor_text_entries.x:
The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs
around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.
flavor_text_entries.y:
It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit
from the body.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs
around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit
from the body.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
This Pokémon appears just before someone
passes away, so it’s feared as an emissary
of death.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
It lurks in cities, pretending to be a lamp.
Once it finds someone whose death is near,
it will trail quietly after them.
